summary: Its A Club For A Giant But Usable For yourself
descriptionHtml:
[font=Times New Roman][b][size=6]Patch[/size]
[size=2]Fixed club from disappearing from your inventory or from the shack[/size]


[size=6]The Giant's Club[/size]
[/b][/font][size=3]The giant's club is a two handed weapon
that a giant would use but now you can
use it for yourself[/size]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#999999][size=6]Where is it
[/size][/color][/font][size=3]this item is found in a abandoned place
found out the exact location in the
archive[/size]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#999999][size=6]Why I did it[/size] 
[/color][/font][size=3]I did this because I thought that Bethesda
didn't make the most of Skyrim. So I Started
modding skyrim and making my own mods 
like this one here
[/size]




[size=3]This Weapon is a brilliant weapon but sadly its to big for your character so its weird looking 
but I hope you guys would enjoy  it if you want me to do stuff to it just put it down in the
comments 
[img]http://img08.deviantart.net/c61c/i/2012/079/6/b/skyrim_daedric_helmet_wallpaper_by_athiosdvk-d4tcwn8.jpg[/img]
[/size][size=4]Other Mods I Made So Far:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75119/?

Check Out This Fallout 4 Mod (not by me)
http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/8676/?


Thank You For Choosing My Mod Enjoy :D


[/size]
author: andy06au
